official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow individuals who do not itemize deductions a deduction for expenses paid or incurred for services in connection with the preparation of any individual income tax return.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow non-itemizing taxpayers to deduct expenses paid for tax return preparation services. Limits such deduction to $25 per taxable year.
